review_data.title: Pizza, nein danke
review_data.content: Ich war heute hier für ein Lunch eingeladen. Ich habe die Tagessuppe genommen (Tomaten/Karotten) und die war mega! Als Hauptgang...More

review_data.title: A cosy place
review_data.content: This place has a homey feeling to it. You get served by the owner and the atmosphere is very relaxed. The menu is not large, but all the food we tried was very good. The prices are also reasonable.

review_data.title: A quiet place near the Kunsthaus
review_data.content: My wife and I bought a group-on to have saturday "brunch" here. The restaurant was very clean, had lots of room and a nice view of the street. Our Group-on coupon made everything reasonably priced, but if we hadn't had it I would have to...More
